name: VINTAGE FRENCH ROUND UPHOLSTERED ARMCHAIR
description: Our reproductions of vintage French dining chairs display the elegant restraint emblematic of neoclassicism. Defined by linear form, tapering fluted columnar legs and scooped arms, the chairs have been updated in hand-carved oak with a soft, weathered finish. - Features a linear form, nuanced carving and scrollwork, and tapering columnar legs - Hand-carved oak frame and hand-turned legs - Generously padded seat - Available in distressed white oak, burnt oak, brown oak drifted, black oak drifted or weathered oak drifted finishes DIMENSIONS Overall: 23"W x 24"D x 40"H Seat: 20"H Arm: 29"H Weight: 37 lbs. Love the color but not the piece? Sign up for COLOR ALERT to be notified when a new piece is stocked in this shade!

name: Flatiron Desk
description: The pairing of antique solid reclaimed elm doors and cast metal achieves the "form meets function" industrial appeal of Flatiron. - Handcrafted of antique reclaimed elm doors and cast metal - Reclaimed elm tabletop is hand-selected, planed, sanded and unfinished, with the patina of reclaimed wood - Tabletop may have holes from hinges or door knob given its previous life as an antique door - Welded, riveted solid steel frame stands on caster wheels and is supported by structural cross bracing - By their nature, unsealed salvaged wood planks may be somewhat uneven, and may cup or bow slightly over time, further enhancing their rustic one-of-a-kind character; cracks may be present - This item is artisan crafted with meticulous care. Given its handmade and hand-finished nature, variations in the wood or metal work are to be expected and celebrated. Each item is unique and no two are exactly alike. Quantities are limited. DIMENSIONS 72"W x 36"D x 30"H; 108 lbs. Love the color but not the piece? Sign up for COLOR ALERT to be notified when a new piece is stocked in this shade!

name: Shutter Low Cabinet
description: Angled louvers, an architectural detail first used in ancient Greece, have found a new place in the home. - Crafted of solid oak with a weathered oak drifted, black oak drifted or brown oak drifted finish; crafted of solid hardwood with a distressed white or distressed taupe finish - Hand-applied finish - Decorative and functional angled louvers - Cast-brass hardware - Features 4 drawers and 2 shuttered cabinets - Catalog and Web only DIMENSIONS 79"W x 24"D x 34"H Love the color but not the piece? Sign up for COLOR ALERT to be notified when a new piece is stocked in this shade!

name: BALUSTRADE SALVAGED WOOD CONSOLE TABLE
description: Our reclaimed pine console table takes the classic architectural baluster and gives it a rustic yet refined sensibility. - Handcrafted of unfinished, solid reclaimed pine timbers from 100-year-old buildings in Great Britain - Graceful hand-carved legs support tabletop - Bears the nicks and imperfections acquired over decades of service - Timbers are hand-planed, sanded and naturally finished - By their nature, unsealed salvaged wood planks may be somewhat uneven, and may cup or bow slightly over time, further enhancing their rustic one-of-a-kind character; cracks may be present - This item is artisan crafted with meticulous care. Given its handmade and hand-finished nature, variations in the wood or metal work are to be expected and celebrated. Each item is unique and no two are exactly alike. - Catalog and Web only DIMENSIONS 71"W x 18"D x 30"H; 53 lbs. Love the color but not the piece?
